website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Level In is a solid, if not overwhelmingly compelling, in-canal earphone pair.
pros: Quality audio performance at moderate-to-loud volumes, with good balance of bass and highs
cons: Remote not intended for iOS devices

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these headphones. They are however my first pair of "high-quality" headphones. I personally love the foam covers. And they fit my ear perfectly. The carrying case is quite nifty. The only negative is instead of pewter or gun metal gray like it appears in the pics, the headphones are a shiny chrome. I'm not really a fan of chrome. But, they work well. And they go great with a Samsung phone.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar G.

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe these are three way balanced armature IEMs.
customer_reviews.text: These sound like hot garbage. Anyone spending the full retail price would have every right to be upset, and there is a reason these are discounted so heavily. They sound very harsh, very fatiguing even after a short amount of time. The only positive is the selection of included silicon and foam tips.
customer_reviews.author: wiandiii

customer_reviews.title: Left earbud died after few weeks!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these earbud headphones assuming that these were high-end. They were discounted from $149 to $24. They look nice but the problem is that the left headphone lost about 90% of its volume after just few weeks! I was careful not to twist the cable and it died on me sooner then another other OEM Samsung white headphones I ever bought in the past. I'm disappointed with the quality but if I had spent $149 on them I would be really angry!
customer_reviews.author: goebos

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sounds awful. No bass response only mids and highs making it sound flat and lifless do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ed1984

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps a bad connection within the headphones somewhere
customer_reviews.text: Did not work out of the box. Very scratchy and distorted sound. Perhaps a bad connection within the headphones somewhere. I had to send back. They were comfortable when I tried them on so it's unfortunate they didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Stevo 1

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: Dead after only 6 months of use. Terrible product from Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: MAX

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung Level In- Earbuds are excellent. The Soundscape and sound separation are outstanding, Clarity is really good including strong accurate Bass. They have a nice design and build quality. I got them for less than $40 so the value was exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: One Ear Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: One month after i got it one ear stopped working, I thought maybe I blow my eardrum. Nope, just a s***ty pair of Samsung headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Mr, Loves Prime

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The level in is great it's my go to on the go in ear headphone.
customer_reviews.author: chinnavong dar

customer_reviews.title: Very poor product...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very poor product, none of the headphone tips seems to fit my ears and this is the first time ever i have this kind of issue with a pair of headphones... i've used them around 10 times and the right headphone is not working anymore, the presentation of the product is great... but for me was a big waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lopardo

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet the description,
customer_reviews.text: Did not meet the description, i think as the metal i got was shiny but on the the photo displayed is matt finished
customer_reviews.author: ShafyMv

customer_reviews.title: ... of Samsung products in our home and they are excellent. Samsung unfortunately did not do well with the ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a lot of Samsung products in our home and they are excellent. Samsung unfortunately did not do well with the Level In-Ear Headset. The In-line controls did not work with my Apple devices and the volume was far too weak.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Wow great sound !!!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is absolutely terrific it is actually better then hearing through my stereo Bluetooth. It's so nice to have a backup that I can just plug in and have the wonderful sound and a wonderful price to match!!!
customer_reviews.author: JfkFlyGuy

customer_reviews.title: Samsung does NOT warrant their products!!!
customer_reviews.text: Samsung does not stand behind their products. You would do well to avoid ALL Samsung products. They are so big the do't care about individuals.
customer_reviews.author: siggystardust

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately no real difference between these and the buds that come with the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon West

customer_reviews.title: Bass is too low, mids and lows are clear.
customer_reviews.text: Bass is too low, mids and lows are clear. I think this earphone is not for listening music, its for hands free calling :) Not worth the money, you should expect more when paying 40$ for earbud. Sennheiser CX 300 || precision bass earbuds are far more better and costs 30$.
customer_reviews.author: Batbayar Bazarragchaa

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Didnt buy them here but very happy with the headset. Very comfortable feeling in the ears dont even notice they are there. Sound quality is superb. Great competition to the Beats series.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: And the sound quality is perfect. It gets all kinds of tiny notes that ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pair I have tried that actually stayed in my ears. And the sound quality is perfect. It gets all kinds of tiny notes that my old pair wasnt even picking up on. It also doesnt seem to tangle as easily. Great ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Dman

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but the price?
customer_reviews.text: I'm fine with my standard issue in-ear that came with my Galaxy phone. Don't get me wrong, the variety of ear tips was great and the sound quality is awesome. A carry case keeps them neat and clean in your bag. I'm just not sure these justify the $149 price tag, even if they are comfortable and sound awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Bunson Honeydew

customer_reviews.title: This are a waste i literally can not hear on these earbugs
customer_reviews.text: I pd $70.00 bucks for these less then a month ago. The store (Boost Mobile) told me i could not get my money back i had to call Samsung. This are a waste i literally can not hear on these earbugs. What a freaking waste. DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customers

product_meta.title: Samsung Level In-Earbud Wired Headphones - Retail Packaging - Black
product_meta.description: in-ear Stereo Headset Introducing The New Samsung Level In In-ear Headset. The High-fidelity Sound And Sleek Design Of These Earbuds Make Them The Perfect Companion For Any Device, Including Your Samsung Galaxy Smartphone Or Tablet.dynamic 3-way Speaker Experience Rich, Clear Treble And Mid-range Sound Through Dual Balanced Armature Driver Units While A Single Low-range Speaker Handles Deep Bass Response.comfort And Style Ergonomic Earpiece Design And Ultra-soft Memory Foam Gels Make The Level In Comfortable Enough For Hours Of Listening, While Its Fashionable Look And Premium Finishes Make Sure You Look Great Doing It.in-line Control Adjust The Volume, Pause/play, Advance To The Next Track And Control Phone Functionality From The Convenient In-line, Multi-function Remote. S Voice Enabled For Easy Touch And Talk Phone Operation.carrying Case Includes Custom Zippered Carrying Case.
feature_bullets: 3-Way speaker system for premium sound reproduction
Powerful Dynamic Speaker for deep bass sound
Beautiful, lifestyle-forward design; Various ear tips for customized sound preference and fit
In-line remote control with volume adjust, play/pause, and skip functions; S-Voice technology for easy phone connectivity
Package includes In-Ear Headphones, Premium Carrying Case Clip, 4 Ear Tips, 3 Memory Foam Tips and Airplane Adapter
